genbank:Reference.genbank:journal: J Neurosci Methods. 2017 Jun 1;284:1-14. doi: 10.1016/j.jneumeth.2017.03.020. Epub 2017 Apr 2.
genbank:Reference.genbank:title: Near-infrared fluorescent protein iRFP713 as a reporter protein for optogenetic vectors, a transgenic Cre-reporter rat, and other neuronal studies.
genbank:Reference.genbank:label: 1 (bases 1 to 7321)

genbank:Reference.genbank:title: Direct Submission
genbank:Reference.genbank:journal: Exported May 12, 2021 from SnapGene Server 1.1.58 http://www.snapgene.com
genbank:Reference.genbank:label: 2 (bases 1 to 7321)

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:aPortionOfThisPlasmidWasDerivedF:
the ORF for iRFP was obtained from Addgene (Plasmid 31857).
the backbone was obtained from Karl Deisseroth, but is also available from Addgene (Plasmid 26971).
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: An AAV vector that expresses engineered halorhodopsin 3.0 (fused to iRFP) under the CaM Kinase IIa promoter.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:academicNonprofitTerms: UBMTA Ancillary Agreement for Plasmids Containing FP Materials

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: phytochrome-based near-infrared fluorescent protein, originally termed iRFP (Filonov et al., 2011)
